pages.text: There is many types of currency in Valt Hunters and they have some uses in Traders and later on Vendors
This is a bronze coin. It commonly drop from monsters in the vault
Silver coins drops from some mobs when you get in to higher levels but can also be craftable
Gold coins is most commonly found in higher levels and mainly from chests
Very rare coin that is used as a currency in vendors that appear at lvl 250 and can be crafted
